The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 August is 2,823 (326.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 August, there were 20 new confirmed cases (2.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 July, there were 28 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 29% (8 fewer cases).
